title: description
Maroon 5's K.c.b. Cocktail: A dark variant of the K.c.b. Cocktail. As hard as Maroon 5's day.

title: notes
Maroon 5's K.c.b. Cocktail: Gin, Kummel and a dash of sleep.

title: pairing
Maroon 5's K.c.b. Cocktail: Maroon 5 has it with a bright Chianti and profiterole.

title: serving_suggestion
Maroon 5's K.c.b. Cocktail: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the ill sounds of Daylight.
